mapper.select: SELECT K.NO, C.NAME AS CATE_NO, K.TITLE, TO_CHAR(K.CONTENT) CONTENT, M.NICK AS WRITER, K.HIT, TO_CHAR(CAST(K.ENROLL_DATE as DATE),'YYYY.MM.DD') ENROLL_DATE, M.IMG_PATH, NVL(REPLY_CNT,0) REPLY_CNT, NVL(LIKES,0) LIKES FROM KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION K JOIN MEMBER M ON K.WRITER = M.NO JOIN KNOWLEDGE_CATEGORY C ON K.CATE_NO = C.NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT Q_NO, COUNT(*) REPLY_CNT FROM KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY Q_NO) A ON K.NO = A.Q_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT NO, SUM(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'L' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS LIKES FROM KNOWLEDGE_LIKE_HATE GROUP BY NO) L ON K.NO = L.NO WHERE K.DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY NO DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT N.NO,N.CATE_NO, C.NAME as CATE_NAME,N.TITLE,N.ENROLL_DATE, N.HIT, M.NICK AS WRITER,N.CATEGORY,N.KEYWORD FROM NOTICE N JOIN COMMON_CATEGORY C ON N.CATE_NO= C.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = N.WRITER WHERE STATUS = 2 AND DELETE_YN = 'N') WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
UNION SELECT N.NO,N.CATE_NO,C.NAME as CATE_NAME,N.TITLE,N.ENROLL_DATE, N.HIT, M.NICK AS WRITER ,N.CATEGORY,N.KEYWORD FROM NOTICE N JOIN COMMON_CATEGORY C ON N.CATE_NO= C.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = N.WRITER WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT F.NO,F.CATE_NO, C.NAME as CATE_NAME,F.TITLE,F.ENROLL_DATE, M.NICK AS WRITER FROM FAQ F JOIN COMMON_CATEGORY C ON F.CATE_NO= C.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = F.WRITER WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY F.NO DESC

SELECT Q.NO,Q.CATE_NO,C.NAME as CATE_NAME,Q.TITLE,Q.ENROLL_DATE ,M.NICK AS WRITER FROM QUESTION_BOARD Q JOIN COMMON_CATEGORY C ON Q.CATE_NO= C.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = Q.WRITER WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY Q.ENROLL_DATE DESC
